backend/main.mo: Actor with access control, user profiles, cycle checks, CoinGecko URL builders, and outcall safety logic for live market data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list of prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/docs/coingecko-debug-dfx.md: Guide describing how to deploy and test raw CoinGecko API responses using a debug function via dfx.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint that loads the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling identity, actor initialization, routing, profile setup, and page selection between dashboard and backend tester.
Dialog UI for adding cryptocurrencies that currently shows a placeholder message indicating backend crypto features are not implemented.
frontend/src/components/BackendTesterEnt: Component rendering a Backend Tester navigation button with admin checks, loading/error states, and limited-mode access for non-admins.
frontend/src/components/ConfigErrorBound: Empty placeholder file for a configuration-related error boundary component.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionBootst: Manages authentication and backend actor initialization with timeout handling and error recovery UI.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionDetail: Displays expandable debug details about connection state, diagnostics, and errors with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionRecove: Empty placeholder file for a connection recovery dialog component.
frontend/src/components/CryptoCard.tsx: Shows live crypto market data, handling cycle exhaustion and other errors, and opens a detail dialog on interaction.
frontend/src/components/CryptoDetailDial: Presents a dialog with forecast charts and settings for a selected cryptocurrency, resetting state on open.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with attribution and investment risk disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/ForecastChart.ts: Fetches and visualizes historical crypto prices with linear regression, moving averages, and future forecasts.
frontend/src/components/ForecastSettings: Provides sliders to adjust moving-average period and forecast horizon for crypto analysis.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component handling theme switching, authentication, and user registration with Internet Identity and backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login prompt displaying platform features and triggering Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/PriceEntryManage: Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving a user's name during profile setup using a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedBashPan: Simulated terminal interface supporting backend commands, auto-reconnection, admin checks, and scrolling output management.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistManager: UI card for managing a watchlist, currently showing a placeholder alert for an upcoming feature.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistPriceTi: Row component fetching and displaying live market data for a single crypto symbol with error handling and price change indicators.
Card displaying live price tick rows for selected cryptocurrencies or an empty-state alert when none are selected.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorEnhanced.ts: Enhances the base actor hook with authentication checks, timeout handling, admin‑init diagnostics, and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectionRecovery: Empty placeholder file for future connection‑recovery logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, admin checks, user roles, and crypto market data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/BackendTesterPage.tsx: Admin and diagnostics page showing user identity, roles, backend access state, and tools for testing canister calls.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard displaying watchlists, live price ticks, and crypto cards, with optional navigation to the backend tester.
frontend/src/utils/backendTesterCommands: Defines command metadata and execution logic for backend tester actions, including CoinGecko live market fetch commands with parsing utilities.
frontend/src/utils/coinGeckoHistoricalDa: Parses CoinGecko historical price data JSON into normalized timestamp/price arrays with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/coinGeckoMarketData.t: Parses CoinGecko market data responses and provides helpers to format prices and market caps.
frontend/src/utils/connectionErrors.ts: Detects and normalizes backend connection and configuration errors, including cycle exhaustion and network issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, architecture notes, issues, and existing feature requirements for backend live data and stability.
